column1: SERIES I SAVINGS BOND INTEREST RATES EFFECTIVE MAY 1, 2024
This chart shows all fixed rates, inflation rates, and composite rates for all Series I savings bonds issued.
Find rates for your bond by locating its issue date in the far left column. Then . . .
‒  The fixed rate is in the next column to the right.
‒  The composite rate for each six-month interest period appears across the table, from left to right, beginning in the column to the right of the column for fixed rates.
‒  The inflation rate for each six-month interest period appears on the bottom row of the table.
‒  How is the composite rate determined?
‒  When do the inflation rate and composite rate for my bond change?
